reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shrug beautiful with a right hint of sparkle, and appreciate its perfect fit that falls above the waistline. The soft silver color adds just enough gold sparkle to make it dressy, and customers consider it perfect for dressy occasions and holidays. They describe it as lightweight and comfortable, with one customer noting it goes well with jeans for casual wear. While the shrug receives positive fee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the Gold!
items.body: This shrug fits perfectly and is well constructed and tailored. Great for dressing up your attire for any occasion. Ordered a size M, 5'3, 118 lbs, 36C. Read more
items.author: Colleen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater!
items.body: I bought this sweater in 2013 to keep me warm while looking nice for my mom’s outdoor wedding. I owned it until last month, when I had to retire it due to my weight loss. It still looked great, so I donated it so someone else can love it. Lacking my favorite sweater and desperate to find something like it for a wedding this month, I scoured the interwebs. I assumed Calvin Klein didn’t make it anymore, since that was a decade ago. I’ve never been so happy to be wrong! This sweater fits true to size, is super comfortable and has just the right hint of sparkle to add magic to a special outfit. Read more
items.author: Wishbone Fan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Bolero
items.body: Very cute sweater/bolero. It is shorter than other boleros I purchased which is good if you are wearing it with a dress so it shows off the dress. I purchased the white sweater and it is slightly see through but not nearly as bad as others Ive tried. Out of 5 white boleros I purchased on Amazon this is the one that I decided to keep. Quality is nice, shorter length, fits nice, and not as see through as others. Read more
items.author: Luedtke

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but much too small
items.body: I ordered an ADULT size Small as a gift for my sister. This sweater was so tiny she couldn't even get her arm in it! Maybe a 6 year old could fit into it. Sizing is way off. Read more
items.author: Donna L. Carter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty, festive and light weight
items.body: This is a very nicely made shrug. Perfect for what I bought it for. Would be nice for the holidays as well. It does have a glitter of gold in it so nice for Christmas parties or New Years. Read more
items.author: Dawn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but too big
items.body: I'm usually an xs and wanted this to work for me so bad! Was looking to wear for my wedding but unfortunately was way too big. The quality was lovely, the style was perfect, the color was great, just too big. I would recommend to others though! For a reference I am 5'5, 110 lbs and 32 bust. Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Little Shrug
items.body: The Silver Shrug was shiny and sparkly but not over the top: just right. Runs true to size. I almost always wear a Medium/10 and the Medium was perfect. (I weigh 138lbs, 5' 3 3/4" , curvy). It came down to my waist. It was perfect for chilly shoulders with my sleeveless dress. It is understated and lets your dress still be the star of the show. Read more
items.author: Out Doorsy Type

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and well made sweater!
items.body: I bought this to wear with a lightweight dress. It looked ok but I ended up adding a Jean jacket instead. The fabric and cut are very nice BUT it does run a little small. I read and reread the reviews and went with medium and would have been better with a large. I kept it hoping to wear it with another dress, or pass it to one of my sisters. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gold Lurex Knit, White Knit, Silver Lurex Knit, White Sheer Knit, Black Knit. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
